1370: Mense moved to Die Coninc straet.A.6 after marriage.
Got married to Myrthel at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Myrthel, Ermerut, at age 20.
1371: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Hadewigis, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Saswe, at age 22.
1377: Lost daughter Hadewigis when Hadewigis was 7 years old.
1379: Had a son with Myrthel, Anthonius, at age 29.
1383: Had a son with Myrthel, Enekonus, at age 33.
1385: Had a son with Myrthel, Reynerus, at age 35.
Lost daughter Ermerut when Ermerut was 16 years old.
1386: Had a daughter with Myrthel, Berta, at age 36.
1391: Lost son Reynerus when Reynerus was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
